entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 13. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
